\subsection{Affix Equivalence Classes}
\label{sec:appendix_affixes}
Each affix identifier corresponds to one or more surface allomorphs. Table~\ref{tab:affix_classes} lists all affix ids and their surface forms from \texttt{ekler.json}.

\small
\begin{longtable}{rp{12.2cm}}

\label{tab:affix_classes}\\
